description: Sum of digits of n written in base 15.
comments: a(n) = A138530(n,15) for n > 14. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 26 2008
links: Robert Walker, Self Similar Sloth Canon Number Sequences
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Digit Sum
formula: a(0)=0, a(15n+i)=a(n)+i 0<=i<=14; a(n)=n-14*(sum(k>0, floor(n/15^k)). - _Benoit Cloitre_, Dec 19 2002
example: a(20) = 1 + 5 = 6 because 20 is written as "15" in base 15.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Mar 28 2000
